name: A World Without Light
description:
This game takes place four quadrillion years after the extinction of all life on earth.

A game about you, a star takes a journey on the surface on the dead planet Earth to grow bigger by collecting the asteroid fragments from the never ending barrage of asteroids falling from space.

CONTROLS -

A OR D - TURN LEFT OR RIGHT

HOLD LEFT CLICK + A OR D - MOVE LEFT OR RIGHT

LCTRL + LSHIFT + R - RESET HIGH SCORE
